item.title: ASM structure analysis
item.description: The base of Logo language is its Abstract Syntax Model. It is represented as a Metamodel in ecore format.

subitem.label: Look at ASMLogo.ecore ASMLogo.ecore is the ecore version of the Abstract Syntax Model of logo. It contains only the structure. (Ecore files can contains only structure)
Look at ASMLogo.ecoredi Since ASMLogo.ecore is a classical ecore file, we can use thirdparty tool to visualize it. Here we use Topcased Ecore editor to have a class diagram view on the ASM.
